post.subject: Star-Studded Cast Channel Details
post.content:
The Stable Channel Star-Studded Cast is a permanent channel through which players can obtain non-limited Signals by spending Master Tapes to Signal Search.

Stable Channel has a New Player Discount, New Player Guarantee, and Additional Recruitment as bonuses!


New Player Discount

• When Proxies first Signal Search on the Stable Channel, the 1st to 5th Ten-Searches cost 20% fewer Master Tapes, for 8 Master Tapes each time.

• From the 6th Ten-Search onwards, the number of Master Tapes required will return to normal.

※ New Player Discount only applies to Ten-Searches, and individual Single Signal Searches are not discounted.


New Player Guarantee

• The first S-Rank Signal Proxies obtain on the Stable Channel is guaranteed to be an Agent. An S-Rank Signal is guaranteed within the first 50 Signal Searches.

※ The New Player Guarantee is permanent and can only be triggered once. After obtaining your first S-Rank Agent, please refer to "Stable Channel Signal Search" for further guarantee rules.


Additional Recruitment

You may select one bonus S-Rank Agent to recruit from the Star-Studded Cast Stable Channel after accumulating a total of 300 Signal Searches on this Channel.

※ Additional Recruitment is permanent and may only be triggered once.


Star-Studded Cast - Stable Trial

• Requirements: Unlock Signal Search

• Time Available: Permanent

• Event Contents: Proxies can try out Agents Lycaon (Stun - Ice), Nekomata (Attack - Physical), Grace (Anomaly - Electric), Rina (Support - Electric), Soldier 11 (Attack - Fire), and Koleda (Stun - Fire) in test stages. Upon clearing the stage for the first time, Proxies can claim rewards on the results screen.


※ For more information on Signal Searches, please press Details at the bottom-left of the Search page.
